name: Arc'teryx Contenta Dress - Women's
description:
A great choice for sunny getaways, this lightweight dress has a fluid drape, dries quickly and packs easily.Diem polyester is light, compressible and resistant to wrinkles.Front pockets and internal zippered security pocket.Adjustable waist, adjuster is inside the left pocket.Relaxed fit.

        Sustainability
